item.title: [COLOR white]DECARGAS [COLOR red]2020[COLOR turquoise] Estrenos de cine[/COLOR]

regex.name: paginado
regex.listrepeat: <title>[COLOR indianred]Estrenos de cine[COLOR gold] Pagina [COLOR lime][paginado.param1][/COLOR]</title> <link>$doregex[regex]</link> <fanart>https://s20.postimg.cc/leltm7n4t/fondo2020.jpg</fanart> <thumbnail>https://s20.postimg.cc/fqfiv8b1p/icono_2020.png</thumbnail>

regex.name: select
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import xbmcgui dialog = xbmcgui.Dialog() ret = dialog.select('Ver con:', ['[COLOR brown]Quasar[/COLOR]', '[COLOR brown]Torrenter[/COLOR]', '[COLOR brown]Elementum[/COLOR]', '[COLOR brown]Torrentin[/COLOR]']) channels = [ 'plugin://plugin.video.quasar/play?uri=[regex1.param1]&image=imageurl&player=0', 'plugin://plugin.video.torrenter/?action=playSTRM&url=[regex1.param1]&image=imageurl&player=0', 'plugin://plugin.video.elementum/play?uri=[regex1.param1]&image=imageurl&player=0', 'plugin://plugin.video.torrentin/?uri=[regex1.param1]&image=imageurl&player=0'] return channels[ret]
